description.@en: It is through my devotion that I am shielded, and as such, I walk amongst the shadows with no fear.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: All foes classified as Abyssal or Supernatural suffer a -10% Base Chance to hit you, regardless of the actions you take against them.
